item.title: Run Jupyter notebook on AWS EC2 using Putty
item.description: Steps to run Jupyter notebooks on EC2 machine. Handy when you don’t want to use Sagemaker and install your own packages.
item.dc:creator: Saurav Sengupta

item.title: Making the website using Pelican and GitHub: Part 2
item.description: Part 2 of steps for making the website using Pelican and GitHub. This post shows how to use Pelican themes and plugins.
item.dc:creator: Saurav Sengupta

item.title: Making the website using Pelican and GitHub: Part 1
item.description: Part 1 of steps to create a website using Pelican and GitHub. It covers making a basic Pelican blog.

item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Welcome to my blog where I talk about data mining, machine learning, reinforcement learning and other types of learning.
